segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen scene unfolding before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing by the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's carefully drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron make her look so domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the floor right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet; her focus is all on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already wet from the spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, a boy is climbing on a little stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up to the open cabinet with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is inside grabbing some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable, tilting back a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's a girl standing nearby, reaching up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems excited, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR
